verses.name: Psalms 96:1
verses.text: O sing unto the Lord a new song: sing unto the Lord, all the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 96:2
verses.text: Sing unto the Lord, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.

verses.name: Psalms 96:3
verses.text: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.

verses.name: Psalms 96:4
verses.text: For the Lord is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.

verses.name: Psalms 96:5
verses.text: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the Lord made the heavens.

verses.name: Psalms 96:6
verses.text: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.

verses.name: Psalms 96:7
verses.text: Give unto the Lord, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the Lord glory and strength.

verses.name: Psalms 96:8
verses.text: Give unto the Lord the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.

verses.name: Psalms 96:9
verses.text: O worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 96:10
verses.text: Say among the heathen that the Lord reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.

verses.name: Psalms 96:11
verses.text: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.

verses.name: Psalms 96:12
verses.text: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice

verses.name: Psalms 96:13
verses.text: Before the Lord: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
